text: Deals 120% attack power as holy damage to designated enemy unit.

Normal Ultimate: Deals 1800% attack power as holy damage to designated enemy. Enhanced Ultimate (after 10 normal attacks): Deals 2160% attack power as holy damage to designated enemy, recovers 2 energy at the end, Counts as a basic-attack hit for any on-hit or combo effects.
When HP is higher then 50%: +48 % Crit Rate on all outgoing damage. When HP is lower then 50%: +96 % Defense when taking damage.
Self attack power increased by 10%. At battle start: For every 500 attack power, increase self holy damage by 5% (maximum 6 times). Maximum scaling: 30% holy damage boost at 3,000+ attack power.
When you using auto skill (Self) it counts as 4 extra basic-attack hits toward the Enhanced Ultimate counter.
When using ultimate or auto skill: Damage taken reduced by 10%

Deals 120% attack power Chaos damage to designated enemy unit.

Call a meteor on the target and all enemies within 2 m, 96 % ATK as Chaos damage on impact. adding 1 layer [Nightmare]. [Nightmare]: Every 3 s deals 5.6 % ATK as Chaos damage per stack, Caps at 10 stacks (total 56 % ATK per tick at max).
Heal lowest-HP ally for 112.8 % ATK(HealerATK) + 668 HP. Enhancement: Heal all allies for 112.8 % ATK + 668 HP and give them 10 % damage reduction for 10 s.

When using auto skill (only you) to attack targets with (20) with dupe 1 (15+) layers of DOT, heals entire team self attack power 97.2%+445 HP and Immediately gain one Empowered Ultimate charge, usable within 8 s.
Passive: Self attack power +10%. Battle Start: Every 500 attack power increases self healing by 5%, max 6 times.

Enters [Day Brilliance] state for 10 seconds. During transformation (State): Allied attack power increases by 120%, and Apollo launches an extra strike dealing 360 % ATK as fire damage when teammate use an ultimate, it will have 100% crit rate and going be counted as Extra damage type. (Rate limit: 1 Extra damage per ally every 5 s.)

Each auto skill use (Self): All allies gain 1 layer [Brilliant]. [Brilliant] Effect: +2.4% critical rate and +4.8% critical damage per layer. Maximum 10 layers (24% crit rate + 48% crit damage at full stacks).
